DOC.brief_summary: The study aim prospectively prove equivalence test product reference solution lower intraocular pressure patient open angle glaucoma ocular hypertension . For purpose patient randomize two sequence study drug administration crossover study adequate wash-out period .
DOC.brief_title: Equivalence Study Dorzolamide 2 % Eye Drops Solution
